commitMessage:
feat: completely remove /load and /save commands (HODGE-336)

## What Changed

**Deleted Infrastructure** (17 files, ~3,950 lines removed):
- Slash commands: .claude/commands/save.md, .claude/commands/load.md
- CLI commands: src/commands/save.ts, src/commands/load.ts
- Core services: src/lib/save-manager.ts (449 lines), src/lib/auto-save.ts (239 lines)
- Type definitions: src/types/save-manifest.ts
- Test files: 7 test files removed (save.test.ts, load.test.ts, save-load integration tests, auto-save tests, save-manager tests)
- Skipped mock-heavy tests: 4 additional test files cleaned up

**Modified Files** (8 files, -42/+42 lines net):
- src/bin/hodge.ts: Removed save/load CLI command registration
- Workflow commands (explore.ts, build.ts, harden.ts, ship.ts): Removed auto-save calls
- src/lib/context-manager.ts: Removed loadSession() and loadRecent() methods (101 lines)
- .claude/commands/hodge.md: Removed --list and --recent flags, updated session guidance
- src/lib/claude-commands.ts: Auto-synced from template changes
- src/test/test-isolation.smoke.test.ts: Removed reference to deleted auto-save.test.ts
- test/commands/hodge-context-loading.test.ts: Updated for new template structure
- scripts/create-test-workspace.test.ts: Removed 3 skipped mock-heavy tests

**Metadata Updates** (5 files):
- .hodge/.session, context.json, id-mappings.json, id-counter.json, project_management.md

## Why This Change

The /save and /load commands duplicated functionality now better served by /hodge HODGE-XXX:

1. **Feature Simplification**: /hodge loads feature context directly, making save/load unnecessary
2. **Reduced Complexity**: Removed ~3,950 lines of unused session management code
3. **Better UX**: /hodge HODGE-XXX is more intuitive than save/load workflow
4. **Maintenance Burden**: Auto-save created 896 directories that were never used
5. **Code Quality**: Removed mock-heavy unit tests, aligning with "test behavior not implementation" principle

## Impact

âœ… **Developer Experience**:
- Simpler workflow: /hodge HODGE-XXX replaces /save + /load
- Fewer commands to learn (reduced from 9 to 7 main commands)
- No more auto-save noise or directory clutter

âœ… **Codebase Health**:
- 3,950 lines removed (net -3,907 lines after updates)
- 17 files deleted
- Zero regressions: 876/876 tests passing
- Improved test quality (removed mock-heavy tests)

âœ… **Architecture**:
- Cleaner separation: ContextManager focused on workflow state only
- No orphaned references (verified via grep)
- Logging standards maintained (HODGE-330)
- CLI architecture standards maintained (HODGE-321)

**Pattern**: When a feature becomes redundant, complete removal is better than deprecation. Clean deletions prevent maintenance burden and reduce cognitive load.

Closes HODGE-336
